column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Now those were just the drinks!  Every bite of food we ate
column3: chewy sourdough bread to the crunchy hash browns with caramelized onions
column4: was absolutely delicious.  We started with a classic that actually originated in Chicago-the Shrimp DeJonghe.  Butter
column8: and texas toast?  Heaven!  Make sure you use that toast to sop of every last bit!
